meanings.sent1: The unilobed leaf was easy to identify.
meanings.sent2: The unilobed flower looked unique in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The unilobed potato rolled off the table and made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her unilobed heart beat with unwavering determination.
meanings.sent5: The unilobed shape of the cloud resembled a perfect circle.
